```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
LH <- read.table('../../data/LifeHistoryVar.txt', header=TRUE, row.names=1)
```

```{r filter}
LH$LateRS <- LH$EarlyRS - LH$Rsen
LH <- LH[, c('CSearly','CSlate','EarlyRS', 'LateRS', 'AvLF', 'ActuarialB')]
pairs(LH)
png(file = 'LH.png')
  pairs(LH)
dev.off()
```
